thumb.title: TOBがチルドレンレコード(Re:boot)を歌ってみた | Tobby Tried to Sing Children Record (Re:boot)
thumb.description: 以前僕がナメた低音と6周年奏イヅルが主催したリレーのおかげでもこの曲をやっと歌えます。With the help of low-range singing that I underestimated back then and a relay that Izuru Kanade organized for his Sixth Debut Anniversary, too, I am finally able to sing this song. Further Commentary (EN) / 追加解説 (EN):https://wp.me/p3Rooj-2k9じん（自然の敵P）先生のチルドレンレコード(Re:boot)を歌わせていただきました。I had the privilege of singing Jin (Shizen no Teki-P)-sensei's Children Record (Re:boot).本家様 / The Great Original:Original Arrange - sm18406343Re:boot Arrange - sm32499603作曲作詞編曲 / Songwriting and Arrangement: じん（自然の敵P） / Jin (Shizen no Teki-P)user/15872264https://jin-jin-suruyo.com首記のリレー / The Abovementioned Relay:https://www.youtube.com/hashtag/ホロスタカゲプロ歌動画リレーVocals and Encode: The Overlord Bear / TOB / Tobbymylist/47503366https://twitter.com/theoverlordbearVocal Edit, Mix, and Mastering: DAMHAhttps://vgen.co/Damhahttps://damhacommission.my.canva.site/mp3:https://bit.ly/3H6Eb0b前のニコニコ歌ってみた投稿 / Previous Niconico Cover Upload: プレイ / playsm45136034

tags.tag: カゲロウプロジェクト
